description: This file defines a React functional component named NodeEditor which provides a minimal interactive node graph with draggable nodes and real-time collaboration features. It manages node positions, supports dragging nodes, and communicates position updates via a collaboration context.

methods.name: NodeEditor()
methods.description: React functional component that renders a draggable node graph with real-time broadcast functionality.

methods.name: onMouseDown
methods.description: Initiates dragging of a node by recording the node ID and offset.

methods.name: onMouseMove
methods.description: Handles node position updates during dragging, updates state, and broadcasts position changes if connected.

methods.name: onMouseUp
methods.description: Ends dragging by resetting the drag reference.

ctags.name: current
ctags.pattern: /^  const onMouseUp = () => { dragRef.current = { id: null, dx: 0, dy: 0 }; };$/

ctags.name: dx
ctags.pattern: /^  const onMouseUp = () => { dragRef.current = { id: null, dx: 0, dy: 0 }; };$/

ctags.name: dy
ctags.pattern: /^  const onMouseUp = () => { dragRef.current = { id: null, dx: 0, dy: 0 }; };$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    dragRef.current = { id, dx: e.clientX - rect.left - node.x, dy: e.clientY - rect.top - node./

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^  const onMouseUp = () => { dragRef.current = { id: null, dx: 0, dy: 0 }; };$/

fields.name: const onMouseUp = () => { dragRef.current = { id: null, dx: 0, dy: 0 }; };
dragRef.current = { id, dx: e.clientX - rect.left - node.x, dy: e.clientY - rect.top - node./
